results.title: Metformin and JQ1 synergistically inhibit obesity-activated thyroid cancer.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, combined treatment of JQ1 and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduced cMyc protein levels to suppress vascular invasion, @<m>DISEASE_Anaplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000708 @@@anaplasia@@@ and @DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@lung metastasis@@@.

citations.NLM: Park S, Willingham MC, Qi J, Cheng SY. Metformin and JQ1 synergistically inhibit obesity-activated thyroid cancer. Endocr Relat Cancer. 2018 Oct;25(10):865-877. PMID: 29914872

results.title: Metformin blocks progression of obesity-activated thyroid cancer in a mouse model
results.text_hl: The prevalence of each pathologic feature in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ treated with vehicle or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is shown as percentage of occurrence for capsular invasion (panel a), vascular invasion (panel b) and @<m>DISEASE_Anaplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000708 @@@anaplasia@@@ (panel c).

citations.NLM: Park J, Kim WG, Zhao L, Enomoto K, Willingham M, Cheng SY. Metformin blocks progression of obesity-activated thyroid cancer in a mouse model Oncotarget. 2016 Jun 7;7(23):34832-44. PMID: 27145454
